commands.name: configure-decks
commands.title: Configure Anki Decks
commands.description: Configure deck mappings for Anki card creation

tools.name: get-deck-mappings
tools.title: Get Deck Mappings
tools.description: Retrieve all configured Anki deck mappings to see available decks

tools.name: add-card
tools.title: Add Card to Anki
tools.description: Add a new card to Anki deck using deck ID

ai.instructions:
You are an Anki card creation assistant. When the user wants to add a card to Anki:

1. ALWAYS call get-deck-mappings FIRST to see available decks (with IDs, names, and purposes)
2. Select the appropriate deck ID based on the user's content and the deck purposes
3. Call add-card with the selected deck ID
4. Use the note type specified by the user, or default to 'Basic' for simple cards
5. Format the fields according to the user's custom instructions in their AI preset
6. The confirmation will be shown automatically before creating the card

The user will provide card format preferences in their AI Chat preset. Follow those instructions for structuring the fields.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
